mapper.update: update issue_task set request = #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, issue_account = #{issueAccount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, accept = #{accept,jdbcType=INTEGER}, giveup = #{giveup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, finished = #{finished,jdbcType=INTEGER}, appraise = #{appraise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appraiselevel = #{appraiselevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, request, issue_account, price, type, starttime, endtime, accept, giveup, finished, appraise, appraiselevel from issue_task where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, request, issue_account, price, type, starttime, endtime, accept, giveup, finished, appraise, appraiselevel from issue_task
